description:
Goat is a http://anidb.net/t7110 [ghoul] resistance organization founded by http://anidb.net/ch99076 [Kaneki Ken]. Their primary goal is to create a world where both humans and ghouls can live together peacefully. Their first plan to achieve this is to bring the http://anidb.net/ch69612 [CCG] to a table by force in order to negotiate.
It gathered surviving members of numerous other gangs and defunct organizations, including http://anidb.net/ch70052 [Aogiri Tree], http://anidb.net/ch70053 [Anteiku], and the http://anidb.net/ch95889 [Tsukiyama family].
Source: Tokyo Ghoul Wiki
name: Goat
